name: MartyOnlyNeedsOranges
tagline: A modern version of the classic Snake game
body: # About the Game ### Tips You can press "P" to pause the gameplay and Space to make the game run faster. ### Intro The game comes with a nice retro-style menu and arcade background music ![39lbbl](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5283392/1143292/06e3251e-1d30-11e3-93b8-23d78defc199.png) Also, it has a variety of options that can be turned on and off (black is off, white is on) ![qzvs4u](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5283392/1143293/06e446ba-1d30-11e3-8cdd-afd5c9bb3e25.png) Marty, the snake is an albino snake that wants to get as many fruits as he can in order to get a nice color. ![4oxbqq](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5283392/1143290/06de4620-1d30-11e3-962f-480630b17e64.png) This is just one of the many colors Marty can get, depending on the amount of fruits that he eats and their color. ![tzgq i](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5283392/1143294/06e6cbce-1d30-11e3-82eb-edd6c772df7a.png) The game also has a "borderless" game option. ![5nk2na](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5283392/1143291/06e464b0-1d30-11e3-9ef5-4000d5d1e29c.png) This version is just for Windows. I might release an Linux & Android version too, depending on whether I'll hve the time or not. ### Release You can find the latest release here # Developing issues ### Plans Release on Linux and Android when the time will allow it ### Details You can find the release file and the code on the github page. ### Reports If you find anything wrong with the game or if you have any ideas related to the game you can contact me at danyhk94@gmail.com ### Bugs and Fixes ``` v1.0 : First release. No bugs reported ```
